snippet: Andy Murray hit error after error and was eliminated from the Madrid Masters in the third round by the qualifier Santiago Giraldo, 6-3, 6-2.
abstract: Santiago Giraldo defeats Andy Murray in the third-round of the Madrid Masters tennis tournament; other tournament results and tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray hit error after error and was eliminated from the Madrid Masters in the third round by the qualifier Santiago Giraldo, 6-3, 6-2.
